Hi! I'm looking to create a new global footer on our website. The previous developer created a custom module, but I'd like to do a drag-and-drop footer. My questions are:
1. How do I disable the current custom module footer? 
2. How can I create a new global footer using drag-and-drop? 
Any help is greatly appreciated! Thanks.

Can you show code snippet and html structure
or idk you already check for this this but make sure it’s not a catch issue

1. If you are using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-templates|drag and drop> template then you can remove footer from it directly.(but I suggest to clone template first and do the changes on cloned template to be on safe side) 
2. You need to create <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-templates#global-groups|global group> for this and then you can easily add widgets (modules) to that global group

1. You can use global module and add smart content by language <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-to-set-up-smart-content-by-preferred-language>
2. or use hubl variable `request.geoip_country` to get country of visitor and set the content based on it
